name: spo-apply-site-theme
title: Apply site theme
shortDescription: Apply a theme to a specific SharePoint site without adding a tenant theme that would be available for all sites.
longDescription: Apply a theme palette to a SharePoint site by sending a JSON theme palette to the SharePoint thememanager/Applytheme endpoint. The script connects using PnP PowerShell, builds the theme JSON, obtains an access token, and calls the REST API to apply the theme.
